name: @paulo-ferraz-oliveira/parse-tool-versions
description: Parse .tool-versions into GitHub Actions steps' outputs

scripts.eslint: npm run eslint-src && npm run eslint-js && npm run estlint-index
scripts.prettier: npm run prettier-src && npm run prettier-js && npm run prettier-index
scripts.format-lint: npm run prettier && npm run eslint
scripts.test: echo "Functional tests will be performed on GitHub via this project's workflows!" && exit 1
scripts.dist:
npm install && npm build && npm run format-lint && echo "
Ready for submission!"
